suggestions.suggestion1: After applying the rub let the meat rest for 30 min to allow the flavours to penetrate
suggestions.suggestion2: allow the meat to marinate ideally overnight to ensure flavours soak into the meat
suggestions.suggestion3: Turn the meat every 20 min over heat to ensure an even roast
suggestions.suggestion4: after applying the basting sauce leave on heat for 7 minutes to allow the sauce to caramelize over the meat
